[selecting a whip]
Try this one on Mr. Davis.
[first lines]

This part of the desert of South Africa, where only a parched camel thorn tree relieves the endless parallels of time, space, and sky, surrounds like a rope of sand the richest diamond-bearing area in the world -- an uneasy land where men inflamed by monotony and the heat sometimes forget the rules of civilization.
Of course, if you're a man of principle...
I take it you're quite experienced.
The German is brittle. The Frenchman cries l'amour! The American is hoping for the cavalry to come.
And what do Englishmen do?
They pay.
Now do you want to kiss me?
N - no, I think not. You'd better keep your kisses for emergencies.
glass, steel, the human soul.
Why don't you sell your rug someplace else?
I am here, free as the wind, fountain of extraordinary knowledge, splendidly corrupt and eager to be of profitable service.
I'm being constantly disillusioned. Has money completely lost its power? Is everyone motivated now by love?
If you ever tried to get away from me, I'd follow you 'til I wore the earth smooth.

[Realizing Suzanne has trapped him in the badger game]
I suppose this is what I deserve for forgetting my age... but I am unmarried.

[to Suzanne]
You know, you must have been such a sweet girl once.
one injection every 15 minutes.
[He finishes a shot of whiskey, and the bartender pours him three more]
The rhythm is very important.

[to Martingale]
Diamonds are your business, but men are mine.
Speaking for myself, I have an enormous antipathy toward dying.
Michael, if you ever believed anyone in your life, please believe me.
Nothing of value is gained easily.
Are you bargaining with me... a pig?

[Contemptuously]
Yes, I am bargaining with you... pig to pig!
[He slaps her several times]
Believe me, he will tell me now.
How do I know I can trust you? I can't compete with love.
[He goes to his humidor for a cigar and seems to change his mind]
Why will i never learn? The most dangerous thing about completely immoral women is their tremendous unused and unpredictable reserve of honest feeling.

[to Thompson about his war experience]
I ent to bed with a 75mm for three years, but now i sleep alone.

[to Vogel]
So long, pig.
Consider this place for a minute if you will. It often reminds one of the interior of a whale's belly.

Honesty.
I'm giving you so much trouble.
